attributes.action: Pay carers of old people and the disabled the same as foster carers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
carers of the elderly and disabled, should be paid the same amount that foster carers are paid and not be treated as second class people anymore.
Most are living with financial worry and poverty, against govenment strategy.
Where is the social inclusion, promised by the govenment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
